short_summary: One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
description: Temporary Help Services Requirement... Wage Rate is CAD
full_summary:
=====================================


**Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services Requirement**

**Tender Number:** S4986033
**Publication Date:** May 27, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 6, 2024, 1:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Notice Description:**
The Department of National Defense requires Temporary Help Services as part of its ongoing operations. This requirement is open to Supply Arrangement holders who have qualifications under the Stream 13: Policy and Advisory Services, Category 13.9: Special Advisor.

**Eligible Suppliers:**
The following Supply Arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* EXPERIS CANADA INC.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
* MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in Joint Venture
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Robertson & Company Ltd.
* Thinkpoint Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Zernam Enterprise Inc.

**Tender Method:**
The tender will be issued through a Competitive-Selective Tendering process.

**Selection Criteria:**
The winning proposal will be selected based on the lowest price among all qualified bid groups.

**Restricted Procurement:**
This procurement is restricted to Supply Arrangement holders who have the required qualifications.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement affirms the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
The procurement is open to National Capital Region (NCR) suppliers.

**Contracting Entity Information:**
The Contracting Entity is the Department of National Defense. Contact information:

* Contact Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Contact Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
N/A from source data
